*** Settings ***
Library           String

*** Test Cases ***
Boolean
    ${x}    Set Variable    bbb
    ${y}    Set Variable    bbb
    Should Be Equal    ${x}    ${y}    Custom error    values=True
    comment    =============
    ${TrueValue}=    Convert To Boolean    True
    ${FalseValue}=    Convert To Boolean    False
    Should Be True    ${TrueValue}
    Should Not Be True    ${FalseValue}
